attributes.action: Ensure that reference to the Holocaust in Germany is retained as a historical event, in the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In asking the Government to ensure that the Holocaust is retained as a Historial event in the National Curriculum, we are concerned that NO country, people, race or religion, have the right to erase or alter history. There should be no provision for schools to 'opt out' - which would be a denial of our support for those who suffer injustice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
